name: Rotato Disc Jam
description:
Here we go again with yet another wacky compilation of minigames. This time for the Disc Room Jam!

Have fun with these little fun-packed games and earn the Golden Cheese without loosing the rhythm on the process!

Rotato Disc Room Jam is based on another project: Rotato. Now based on the Disc Room Jam! because we like to face challenges.
